alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Knox; Peoria (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 3:42AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fulton, southeastern Knox, and Peoria Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 340 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gilson, or 12 miles southeast of Galesburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Peoria, Canton, Lewistown, Farmington, Elmwood, Bellevue, Princeville, Dunlap, Cuba, Hanna City, Glasford, Trivoli, Brimfield, Yates City, St. David, Fairview, Laura, Kickapoo, Norwood and Dunfermline. This includes the following highways... Interstate 474 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 74 between mile markers 65 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
